name: Spider (itch) (ISTA451Spider)
description: Spider is a sci-fi soulslike experience where you jump in as a rogue space swordsman set on their quest to destroy the great spider that has taken refuge in the castle from an age long ago. Use engaging attack styles and your ultimate ability to destroy the evil beast, before it does the same to you. Spider is set in a far off future where the line between science fiction and fantasy has been blurred, and you are a rogue starlight swordsman exploring the ruins of an outer worlds fortress lost to time floating among an asteroid belt. You face the great spider, the one who brought calamity to this ancient civilization and it is your task to battle, and destroy it!
